headline: GRANVILLE PHILLIPS CONVECTRON GAUGE 275-806
specstable:
Manufacturer Granville Phil
Model 275-806
Description Mini-Convectron Gauge/KF
Other Information

Flange: KF16
One Setpoint process relay
Operating voltage 11.5-16VDC
Range: 1 mTorr to 1000 torr for N2
Temperture range: +4°C to +50°C
Bakeout:

  • 85°C max with electronics attached
  • 150°C max with electronics removed
    Power supply and cables not included

User manual https://www.mksinst.com/docs/R/GP-275-275830-MAN.pdf

Exterior Dimensions
Width 4.000 in (10.2 cm)
Depth 1.500 in (3.8 cm)
Height 3.500 in (8.9 cm)
Weight 2 lb (1 kg)
